title: HPE security advisory (AV25-844)
description: On December 16, 2025, HPE published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products. Included was a critical update for the following :
products: HPE OneView  versions prior to v11.00
HPE Telco Service Activator  version 10.3.2 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
